description.narrative: Australia's contribution to support Commonwealth Small States Offices for 2013-14. This Investment covers two core contributions to Commonwealth Small State Offices in New York (USD174,730) and Geneva (USD80,000) respectively. Australia's contribution to the New York (NY) Office builds upon a long-term commitment to its work, dating back to 1983. As one of three lead donors, Australia funds the NY Office to facilitate the participation of 11 small states in relevant NY-based forums and events. An example of an outcome of funding is that these 11 states are able (via the NY Office support) to represent themselves at United Nations events hosted in NY. Australia's support to the Geneva Office dates to a commitment (made at the 2009 Commonwealth Heads of Government Meeting) funds facilities for small island states (particularly from the Pacific) to access to ensure their diplomatic presence and participation in multilateral events (such as those hosted by the World Trade Organization an
